author: Video Advice
description:
Dr. Michio Kushi was a Japanese scientist whose ideas quietly challenged the limits of modern understanding.
Decades later, his message still stands among the most eye-opening teachings ever recorded.

title: He Revealed Too Much Before Congress, Then They Banned Him
